Stephen Smith wrote:

> Is there any situation in which multiple assertions per test can be
> justified?

Do you mean multiple assertion /failures/ per test? Sure, I guess, but 
in that case, why not just put all our assertions in one big test method?

 > For example, talking to an expensive external resource that
> can't easily be mocked (e.g. third party hardware)?

I'm not sure why that can't be /easily/ substituted in a test. Wrap, 
extract interface, inject.
